original_text: And he did that which was evil in the sight of the Lord, according to all that his fathers had done.
korean_text: 여호야김이 그의 조상들이 행한 모든 일을 따라서 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하였더라

sentences.original_text: And he did that which was evil
in the sight of the Lord
according to all that his fathers had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 조상들이 행하던 모든 것과 같이 행하였다
